mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation (place_num, user_num,rsv_name, rsv_year, rsv_month, rsv_date, rsv_start_t, rsv_end_t, rsv_purpose, rsv_request, rsv_refund_yn, rsv_refund_reason, inv_bf_tax, inv_bf_tax_mthd, pay_year, pay_month, pay_date, pay_num, pay_coup_yn, pay_coup_num) VALUES(#{placeNum}, ${rsvId},${rsvName},${rsvYear}, ${rsvMonth}, ${rsvDate}, ${rsvStartT}, ${rsvEndT}, ${rsvPurpose}, ${rsvRequest}, ${rsvRefundYN}, ${rsvRefundReason}, ${rsvPay}, ${payYear}, ${payMonth}, ${payDate}, ${payMethod}, ${payNum}, ${payCoupYN}, ${payCoupNum} );
mapper.update: UPDATE payment SET rsv_refund_yn = 1 WHERE rsv_num=#{rsvNum}
UPDATE reservation SET rsv_review_yn = 'Y' WHERE rsv_num=#{rsvNum}
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT r.place_num,r.user_num,r.rsv_num,r.rsv_year,r.rsv_month,r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_t,r.rsv_end_t,a.rsv_refund_yn,r.inv_bf_tax,r.rsv_review_yn, p.user_id,p.place_area,p.place_name,p.place_thumb FROM reservation r join place p using(place_num) join payment a using(rsv_num) WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum} AND a.rsv_refund_yn = 0 AND (r.place_num,r.user_num,r.rsv_num,r.rsv_year,r.rsv_month,r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_t,r.rsv_end_t,a.rsv_refund_yn,r.inv_bf_tax,r.rsv_review_yn, p.user_id,p.place_area,p.place_name,p.place_thumb) NOT IN(SELECT r.place_num,r.user_num,r.rsv_num,r.rsv_year,r.rsv_month,r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_t,r.rsv_end_t,a.rsv_refund_yn,r.inv_bf_tax,r.rsv_review_yn, p.user_id,p.place_area,p.place_name,p.place_thumb FROM reservation r join place p using(place_num) join payment a using(rsv_num) WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum} AND DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%m') >= r.rsv_month AND DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%d') > r.rsv_date) OR r.user_num = #{userNum} AND a.rsv_refund_yn = 1 AND (r.place_num,r.user_num,r.rsv_num,r.rsv_year,r.rsv_month,r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_t,r.rsv_end_t,a.rsv_refund_yn,r.inv_bf_tax,r.rsv_review_yn, p.user_id,p.place_area,p.place_name,p.place_thumb) NOT IN(SELECT r.place_num,r.user_num,r.rsv_num,r.rsv_year,r.rsv_month,r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_t,r.rsv_end_t,a.rsv_refund_yn,r.inv_bf_tax,r.rsv_review_yn, p.user_id,p.place_area,p.place_name,p.place_thumb FROM reservation r join place p using(place_num) join payment a using(rsv_num) WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum} AND DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%m') >= r.rsv_month AND DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%d') > r.rsv_date) ORDER BY r.rsv_month ASC, r.rsv_date ASC;

SELECT r.place_num,r.user_num,r.rsv_num,r.rsv_year,r.rsv_month,r.rsv_date, r.rsv_start_t,r.rsv_end_t,a.rsv_refund_yn,r.inv_bf_tax,r.rsv_review_yn, p.user_id,p.place_area,p.place_name,p.place_thumb FROM reservation r join place p using(place_num) join payment a using(rsv_num) WHERE r.user_num = #{userNum} AND a.rsv_refund_yn = 2 OR r.user_num = #{userNum} AND a.rsv_refund_yn = 3 ORDER BY r.rsv_month ASC, r.rsv_date ASC;

select a.*, (select count(*) from reviewGuest where place_num=a.place_num) as review_cnt, (select round(avg(review_guest_rate),1) from reviewGuest where place_num = a.place_num) as avg_rate, (select user_nick_name from member where user_id=a.user_id) as user_nick_name from place a where place_num=#{placeNum} order by place_reg_date desc ;
